page.title: 14BROOK PRIMARY SCHOOL 2
page.content: In 1985 the pupils have raised #300 for the Ethiopian Famine Relief.Even the infants join in with charity work and on Sports Day they take part.They also do a Christmas nativity play each year whilst the juniors act out the history of Brook,in the church. Brook School is set in beautiful sur- roundings in the countryside.Itis situated just outside the village of Brook and there are trees and fields around it.The pupils have a nature garden where there are ponds and small insects and animals which both infants and juniors help to look after. The pupils of Brook School get on well with each other and also with their teachers.They all enjoy their lessons very much. Although it is a small school they have a computer which the juniors use once a week.
